CatDescriptText: Mr. John E. Nesby, 4060 Windgap Road was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1958, pg. A2, with question: "Do you think that Negroes display any racial prejudice towards each other?"  Answer reads: "Yes, sir! And I wonder how can we as Negroes expect to be appreciated among the whites if we discriminate among ourselves."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of John E. Nesby holding plaid lined jacket, standing in front of Jenkins Arcade, Liberty Avenue, Downtosn
